title: Russia Hints at Development of CBDC-Based BRICS Bridge Payments System
description: Russia has proposed the development and implementation of a BRICS-wide payment system that would use central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to manage trade settlements. The BRICS bridge, as referred to by Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov, would address the fragmentation of the current payment system outside the West’s “unfriendly infrastructure.” Russia Hints at Using CBDC […]

title: Bringing Two Worlds Together: Kinetex Announces ZK Light Client For Bitcoin
description: PRESS RELEASE. Kinetex is excited to introduce BTCX, a Bitcoin ZK light client built with Succinct Labs. Developed using Succinct’s plonky2x framework and deployed seamlessly through its unified proving stack, BTCX enables EVM-compatible networks to verify the Bitcoin state directly without any centralized actors in between. The creation of this solution is the first step […]

title: Coinbase launches new feature for recovering assets sent to BNB Chain and Polygon
description: Coinbase, a leading crypto exchange, has introduced a new feature allowing users to recover assets mistakenly sent to the platform’s unsupported blockchains, such as BNB Chain and Polygon. According to the announcement on Feb. 27, users looking to reclaim their lost assets only need to provide a transaction ID and the inbound Coinbase wallet address, […]
